modules.description: Provides functions to manage Cairo font maps, including creating, setting, and retrieving default font maps, adjusting resolution, and determining the font backend type. Works with font maps that interface with Cairo's font backend, supporting types like fontconfig, win32, and coretext. Used to configure font rendering settings for Pango contexts in multi-threaded applications.

Provides functions for drawing shapes, text, and images using the Cairo graphics API, including operations for setting colors, transforming coordinates, and rendering to surfaces. Works with data types such as surfaces, contexts, and paths to enable vector graphics creation. Used to generate scalable graphics in GUI applications and export images in various formats.

Manages font configuration and rendering settings for text layout in Pango, integrating with Cairo's font backend. Supports operations on font maps, including creation, resolution adjustment, and backend type detection, with specific support for fontconfig, win32, and coretext. Allows setting default font maps for Pango contexts, enabling consistent text rendering across threads. Example tasks include adjusting font resolution for high-DPI displays or switching between backend implementations based on platform.
